description: Some of you will remember that this was the first guy/guy video that Ransom ever did and that it was Jack who originally introduced us to Ransom. Jack is a lot like me and he just loves picking up stray guys and taking them in. Now Jack is quite a sly little fox and he'd already talked Ransom into letting him suck his cock since they were roommates and Jack had plenty of time to work his magic. But, Ransom had never returned the favor until we convinced him this particular day that it was only the fair thing to do. And return the favor he did. Ransom got right in there and gave our buddy Jack a run for his money. All this would prime him up for the scene he would go on to do with Kaden and Brian in Direct Orders 2 where he not only sucked more cock, but also got fucked for the first time, giving up that virgin ass he brags about in this scene with Jack.
title: Jack & Ransom
